overview:
Stephanie is currently undertaking a BSc degree in Politics at the University of Bristol; graduating in July 2012. Her studies have led her to focus on development politics and economics, specializing in the politics of Sub Saharan Africa and power relations in Asia.

Stephanie is also currently undertaking a scholarship at Deloitte Consulting UK. During her time at Deloitte, she has worked in both Central and Regional level teams of three large Global HR Transformation Projects.

Besides her University work and work at Deloitte, Stephanie is a co-founder and Director at Fittingly, an online clothes fitting service.
